parameters.name: Criteria
parameters.description: The attribute value of the condition parameter.

parameters.name: CriteriaType
parameters.description:
The property name of the condition parameters. Values:
 - **RepoNamespace**: Namespace.
 - **RepoName**: Repository name.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page. Default value: 20. If you leave this parameter empty, 20 entries are returned on each page.

>  We recommend that you do not leave this parameter empty.

parameters.name: RiskKey
parameters.description: The key of the risk. You can call the [DescribeImageBuildRiskList](~~~~) operation to obtain the value of RiskKey.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the alert event. Valid values:

*   **0**: unhandled.
*   **1**: ignored.
*   **2**: false positive.
